thread.section_title: Snowcountry Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Snowcountry | snowcountry.eu
thread.title: Guillaume N.

author: Guillaume N.
title: Guillaume N.
text:
The website is very clear, there is a large choice of skis (the skis i wanted are not the easiest to find), AND a large choice of bindings for every ski (not always like this).
Prices are honest, also for delivery in a foreign country (France).
Clear communication about my order, bindings mounted as i asked, the skis were perfectly packed and protected --> Very professional.
This is my first experience with Snowcountry, and this is a happy one ;)
